comments:
1.5M6 + 3.2RC1a

I just created a new dynamic web project because I wanted to do some prototyping. Therefore I copied some existing content into the web content folder including a jsp file. During and after the copy operation I got a lot of error messages indicating all the same problem.


eclipse.buildId=unknown
java.version=1.5.0_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=de_DE
Framework arguments:  -product com.truition.sdk.ide -pdelaunch
Command-line arguments:  -product com.truition.sdk.ide -data T:\workspaces\edealInv-dev -dev file:T:/workspaces/sdk-dev/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/edealInv-dev/dev.properties -pdelaunch -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86

Error
Sat Apr 22 10:17:09 EDT 2006
An internal error occurred during: "Updating JSP Index".

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax/servlet/jsp/tagext/TagLibraryInfo
at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.taglib.TaglibHelperCache.createNewHelper(TaglibHelperCache.java:112)

Please retry with 1.5 RC1a.
